reviewText:
I  was so grateful and happy I found this rare mock "roast" Heidi Abromowitz,  character Joan wrote a hit book about "The Life and Hard Times of Heidi Abramowitz"

This has a great all star cast, some as you never seen them before!

Joan Rivers' salute to Heidi Abromowitz is pure fun and humorous for any fan of the legendaty comedienne, with  celebrity guest speakers and Joan trying to locate Heidi, this classic 1980's vhs treasure will be a great addition to any fans collection.
Lover her actually, Though quite disappointed,she was better when i saw her live in Australia.

It does have funny moments...but Joan has used these jokes over and over and over on other programs. In this video, she and a co-star spend most of the movie looking for Heidi who never really appears. That got old fast, the frantic search scenes.
